title: Sustainable Material Packages
intro: Breathe easier with storage built from eco-certified materials. Ideal for nurseries, allergy sufferers, and green homes.
highlights: NAF (No Added Formaldehyde) and ULEF (Ultra Low Emitting Formaldehyde) boards
FSC-certified wood veneers and recycled-content cores
Hardware from manufacturers with closed-loop recycling

avgCost.notes: Eco-grade materials typically add 15-20% to the project cost compared to standard melamine.

faqs.a: No, they look and feel just as premium as standard high-end finishes. The difference is in the air quality and sourcing.
Yes, sustainable packages available through our network can contribute points towards LEED certification for home remodels.
